items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension that allows users to quickly launch top trading websites like NEPSE Alpha, TradingView, MeroLagani, and Forbes Crypto. Built to serve as a personal trading dashboard with future integrations for portfolio tracking, alerts, and Google Docs sync.
items.title: hecticSubraz/Trading-assistant-extension: A lightweight Chrome extension that allows users to quickly launch top trading websites like NEPSE Alpha, TradingView, MeroLagani, and Forbes Crypto. Built to serve as a personal trading dashboard with future integrations for portfolio tracking, alerts, and Google Docs sync.

items.content_html: Quantava is a powerful, expressive ORM for Node.js, built on SQLite. It offers a modern, intuitive API with advanced features like schema validation, soft deletes, and fluent query building — all in a lightweight package.

items.content_html: A lightweight, dependency-free popup block built for the WordPress block editor (FSE compatible). Uses native blocks like Button for triggering, and keeps layout clean, accessible, and native to Gutenberg.
